channel.title: Code help please
channel.description:
I have searched for these codes and im not 'lazy' (Official Quote) I just need a little help with these codes. 1. Special Attack Codes or what i need for them 2. Colour change Party Hats and 3. Bronze,pink,black party hats etc. Copy + Paste the form below or just tell the codes.
THE CODE FORM 1. Special attack code is: 2. Color Change Party Hat code is: 3. Misc. Party Hat colour codes are:
Official isn't it? Note: You dont have to complete it. [shadow=red,left]Please and Thank yous.[/shadow]

item.title: Code help please
